mapper.sql: id, fromUserId, toUserId, content, status, type, createTime, lastUpdate
mapper.select: SELECT , (select muu.nickname from msg_uc_user muu where muu.id=mu.fromUserId) nickname FROM msg_user_message mu WHERE toUserId = #{toUserId} AND status != '0' AND createTime > date_sub(now(), interval '181 0:0:0' day_second) ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT mu.id, mu.fromUserId, mu.toUserId, mu.content, mu.status, mu.type, mu.createTime, mu.lastUpdate, muu.nickname,muu.userPicturePath FROM msg_user_message mu join msg_uc_user muu on mu.fromUserId=muu.id WHERE mu.toUserId = #{userId} AND mu.status != '0' AND mu.createTime > date_sub(now(), interval '181 0:0:0' day_second) ORDER BY mu.createTime DESC
